channel.title: When I try and run my client, it says
channel.description: JAVA is not recognized as an internal or external command..blah blah blah. I have newest Java(s), and correct Classpath and Path variables. Any help with this? When I try to compile it, the cmd box opens, and NOTHING is on it.

item.title: When I try and run my client, it says
item.dc:creator: @ghostkid303 ghostkid303
item.description:
@ghostkid303 wrote:

i don’t clients are compatible with the latest release. go for like 6u5 and under. then reset your classpaths, post if this works.

Read full topic
